AutoMQ/automq

AutoMQ is a Kafka-compatible streaming platform that runs on S3, so you can handle big data without managing disks

View on index

Related repos

  • Kafka—event streaming, processing, and storing data streams
  • Kafka-compatible streaming platform, fast and simple, no JVM
  • cloud MySQL with S3 storage, runs anywhere
  • Stream large files from S3, GCS, and HDFS
  • Streams and batches data into warehouses via Kafka
  • Python framework for async event stream services with Kafka, RabbitMQ, NATS, Redis
  • Fast Postgres data streaming with CDC
  • Tracks media releases for download queues
  • Change data capture platform for databases using Kafka
  • S3-compatible object storage server for storingand managing data
